name: Outlaws
description:
Outlaws is a shooting gallery game created for the 2016 CPCRetroDev Game Creation Contest.

You play as Daniel Colt who returns home to Cowntury County, a place that has been overrun by bandits, to seek revenge and liberate the town.

The game play similarly to games like Cabal where you move your character back and forth along the bottom of the screen to dodge oncoming bullets while simultaneously aiming and shooting at enemies using a targeting reticle. Shooting and destroying a barrel has a chance to drop either money, which gives you extra points, or a drink of life, which gives you a extra life. You must fire at these items in order to pick them up.

To complete each level you must kill a certain number of enemies displayed in the bottom left of the screen next to a skull. There are nine main levels in the game along with an initial training level and two bonus levels.
